description: Clean up breadcrumb navigation and verify persistent functionality
steps: Locate breadcrumb component in the header
Assert 'Chat' button is not present in the DOM
Click 'Traces' button and verify navigation to the trace logs
Verify 'Traces' button CSS matches the design system (no broken styles)

description: Modernize Thread List layout to a minimalist, list-based design
steps: Inspect thread container elements for 'border' and 'box-shadow' properties (should be minimal or none)
Compare layout spacing against the minimalist list-based reference
Trigger 'hover' state on a thread item and verify background/border color transition
Confirm thread list scrolls smoothly without layout shifts

description: Consolidate LLM and Model selection into the Chat Input area
steps: Verify the LLM provider dropdown is removed from the sidebar
Locate the LLM provider dropdown within the Chat Input component
Locate the Model selection dropdown adjacent to multi-modal/attachment icons
Select a new model and verify the state updates the next sent message

description: Refactor Environment Key warnings to a non-intrusive footer
steps: Remove API keys from the local environment
Assert that the large 'Alert' box is no longer visible
Verify a small warning footer appears below the chat input
Ensure the warning does not block the 'Send' button or input visibility

description: Optimize Agent Sidebar and Model Settings for scannability and modern UX
steps: Open Agent Sidebar and verify information hierarchy follows the new design spec
Navigate to Model Settings
Verify settings no longer use standard HTML 'back-office' form styles
Test toggle switches and inputs for immediate UI feedback

description: Standardize Memory Tab components using playground-ui library
steps: Navigate to the Memory Tab
Inspect DOM elements to ensure they utilize classes/components from 'packages/playground-ui'
Verify that all custom/legacy components identified in the audit are removed
Perform a CRUD operation on memory to ensure refactored logic remains functional
